JOB BOARDS AND YOUTH UNEMPLOYMENT: They haven't changed the narrative that much. Most of the job market is through employee referrals and almost always those who apply through these boards can't compete with those with employee referrals, this is most especially seen when the is a very limited number for the post. Job boards are not completely useless, but it is very far from being as effective as it is supposed to be. I would still recommend job boards because it is better to try that than sit at home and do nothing.
